text:
Antonio Ángel Algora Hernando (2 October 1940 – 15 October 2020) was a Spanish prelate of the Catholic Church. He was bishop of Teruel and Albarracín from 1985 to 2003 and Ciudad Real from 2003 to 2016. He was born in La Vilueña, Spain.
Algora Hernando died on 15 October 2020 from COVID-19 in Madrid at the age of 80.
